issue.title: Build a Simple Todo CLI
issue.body:
## Overview
Build a simple command-line todo list manager in TypeScript.

## Requirements

### Features
1. Add a todo item
2. List all todos
3. Mark a todo as complete
4. Delete a todo

### Technical
- TypeScript
- Store todos in a JSON file (todos.json)
- Use commander.js for CLI
- Keep it simple

### Commands
```
todo add "Buy groceries"
todo list
todo complete 1
todo delete 1
```

### File Structure
```
src/
  index.ts    # CLI entry point with commander
  todo.ts     # Todo operations (add, list, complete, delete)
  storage.ts  # JSON file storage
  types.ts    # TypeScript interfaces
```

Keep it minimal!
